title: Medallion, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular medallion in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; ornamented with bust in classic manner; white on blue ground.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-38.
